snippet: The Day: "The Scream" set a record for an artwork sold at auction Wednesday. Inevitably, some will be appalled that so much money was spent on art, no matter how celebrated.
abstract: The Day: "The Scream" set a record for an artwork sold at auction Wednesday. Inevitably, some will be appalled that so much money was spent on art, no matter how celebrated.

headline.main: Spending Big Money on an 'Infinite Scream of Nature'
